p: In another study, the bioavailability by oral administration of fisetin (FST), a potent anticancer phytoconstituent, was enhanced by encapsulation into PLGA NPs (poly-lactide-co-glycolic acid nanoparticles) and association into inclusion complexes containing HP-Î²-CD. This increased the peak plasma concentration and total drug absorbed, improving its anti-cancer activity against breast cancer cells [ 81].
